name: THE RECKONING Editions by Lauren Thompson

metadata.name: The Reckoning #1/30
metadata.description:
April 21, 2022 in Rozel, Kansas: Night summoned this beautiful low precipitation supercell as the the brushstrokes of sunset gently faded into blue hour. It crept slowly across the sky, closer and closer toward this weathered barn becoming more ominous by the minute. Suddenly a twisted lightning bolt boiled inside the updraft and burst forth from the clouds like a reckoning from within.
